snippet: The Supreme Court in India issued a stay of execution for two of the four men convicted of the gang rape and murder of a 23-year-old student on a bus in 2012.
abstract: India's Supreme Court issues temporary stay of execution for two of the four men convicted of the gang rape and murder of a 23-year-old student on a bus in 2012.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court in India issued a stay of execution for two of the four men convicted of the gang rape and murder of a 23-year-old student on a bus in 2012.

headline.main: Executions Delayed for Two in India Gang Rape Case
headline.print_headline: High Court Delays Executions in New Delhi Gang Rape Case
